overview:
Charles is a serial entrepreneur. He received an M.S.from the University of Wisconsin-Madison & business certificate from GSB Stanford University. He then worked for various Fortune 500 companies in various functions including e-commerce, logistics, marketing research, and customer service. His true passion, however, is business.

He successfully acquired angel investment in 2009 and founded Top Admit, the leading bilingual online educational-services in Asia (selected by Technode.com as one of the top six websites among 40 teams in Echelon 2011). He has since then helped hundreds of students from China, Taiwan, and US get into elite schools such as Harvard, Wharton, MIT, etc. in the past few years.

He is now developing my angel investments interest and successfully invested in few companies. He is keen on investment ideas & opps in Web2.0, education, B2C e-commerce, and new media. He is now preparing to launch a new IT & Marketing service company as well as an e-commerce platform.
